## LeagueEntry class

A representation of a summoner's competitive details.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LeagueEntry 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, data)](./shieldbow.leagueentry._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>LeagueEntry</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [division](./shieldbow.leagueentry.division.md) |  | [DivisionType](./shieldbow.divisiontype.md) | The division under the tier - From 1 to 4 (I - IV). |
|  [freshBlood](./shieldbow.leagueentry.freshblood.md) |  | boolean | Whether the summoner is new to the game. |
|  [hotStreak](./shieldbow.leagueentry.hotstreak.md) |  | boolean | Whether the summoner is on a hot streak. |
|  [inactive](./shieldbow.leagueentry.inactive.md) |  | boolean | Whether the summoner has been inactive. |
|  [league](./shieldbow.leagueentry.league.md) |  | string | The league ID. |
|  [losses](./shieldbow.leagueentry.losses.md) |  | number | The number of losses the summoner has in this queue. |
|  [lp](./shieldbow.leagueentry.lp.md) |  | number | The amount of league points (LP) the summoner has. |
|  [promos?](./shieldbow.leagueentry.promos.md) |  | { readonly target: number; readonly wins: number; readonly losses: number; readonly progress: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> This only exists if the summoner is in a promotion series. |
|  [queueType](./shieldbow.leagueentry.queuetype.md) |  | [QueueType](./shieldbow.queuetype.md) | The type of queue - such as RANKED\_SOLO\_5x5, RANKED\_FLEX\_SR or RANKED\_FLEX\_TT. |
|  [summoner](./shieldbow.leagueentry.summoner.md) |  | Promise&lt;[Summoner](./shieldbow.summoner.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The summoner this data belongs to.<!-- -->Uses [SummonerManager.fetch()](./shieldbow.summonermanager.fetch.md) to get the summoner. |
|  [summonerId](./shieldbow.leagueentry.summonerid.md) |  | string | The ID of the summoner this data belongs to. |
|  [summonerName](./shieldbow.leagueentry.summonername.md) |  | string | The name of the summoner this data belongs to. |
|  [tier](./shieldbow.leagueentry.tier.md) |  | [TierType](./shieldbow.tiertype.md) | The tier the summoner belongs to - such as BRONZE, GOLD, etc. |
|  [veteran](./shieldbow.leagueentry.veteran.md) |  | boolean | Whether the summoner is a veteran or a pro player. |
|  [wins](./shieldbow.leagueentry.wins.md) |  | number | The number of wins the summoner has in this queue. |
